titles.title: We're Overcoming By The Word Of Our Testimony

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
We're overcoming by the word of our testimony.
What is your testimony today?
Is it a word of faith or a word of doubt?
What is your testimony today.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
We're overcoming by the word of our testimony.
This is my testimony today.
It's a word of faith, not a word of doubt.
This is my testimony today.
